text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump WASHINGTON -President Donald Trump will visit a Lehigh Valley medical equipment distributor Thursday,he’s expected to talk about coronavirus testing and the equipment needed to combat the public health crisis,a White House spokesman confirmed first to The Morning Call on Monday!
